settings.heading: Where is my order?
settings.row_content:
Have you:

1. Checked your spam folder for our shipping update?

2. Contacted the shipping provider as outlined in our guide here?

3. Read our latest update? Whilst most delivery services are back to normal, we're still seeing some delays.

If you have checked and still had no luck, we're really sorry! Please message us and we'll look into this for you as a priority.

settings.heading: I'd like to return an item
settings.row_content:
We're more than happy to accept returnsÂ as outlined in our return policy. Items must be:

Within 30 days from the date of receipt

Unused and in their original condition

To initiate a return please pack up your backdrop(s) carefully, post toÂ the appropriate returns address, then message us below with your return tracking details.

settings.heading: The website or editor isn't working
settings.row_content:
Sorry to hear you're having some trouble! We first suggest to try the following:

1. Clear your browser cache or reload the site an incognito/private window

2. Try another browser

If you continue to experience an issue please message us below with a brief description. You can also add a screenshot so we can better troubleshoot for you ðŸ˜€

settings.heading: Can we collaborate?
settings.row_content:
At this time we're not accepting upfront offers to collaborate. We actively search for collaboration opportunities when have a specific project in mind from within our follower network.

What do we look for?
Out-of-this-world photography.

We're less impressed by numbers.
We care most about the craft and your art.
We like to work withÂ studio photographersÂ who are better than us!
Who are creating imagery thatÂ excites and inspires usÂ and our followers.

Like the phenomenalÂ @daryna_barykina
Or the utterly alluringÂ @gerardbelevender
And the meticulously polishedÂ @karolinaimg

And we make it worthwhile for those thatÂ blow our minds.

If you think you're up to it:
Get familiar with our product.
Take sublime pictures.
Get to know us.
If you make an impression, we can take it from there...

We don't respond to any upfront requests for free product.
